content.label: Dungeon crawling at its best.
Very fun dungeon explorer with great ambient music. Make more!

What a great little game for short periods of play - on the train - in between meetings - waiting for lunch. You can play for a few minutes, have some great retro style fun and when u come back to it pick up right where u left off.
Good times!

Good fun! I didn't expect to enjoy it as much as I have. A perfect dungeon crawler for those who have 10-15 minutes here and there to play as well as when there are longer periods available for mayhem. Can't wait to see the next game.
I loved the original but all the little additions make it even better :-)

More streamlined and accessible than PC rogue like games, and much better UI than the iPhone ports of netball and similar. I'd like a little more depth to character skills and leveling.  Looking forward to v2.
A blast!  Brings me back to my childhood.  Definitely worth the price of admission.

Great old school game. The dungeons are all random and complex. Darkness monsters and treasure around every corner. The game is simple but charming and I would easily pay a few bucks for it. Being that its free it makes it all the better.

If you like classic dungeon exploring games, It's a must download
cool dungeon crawler
Fun.
I would have paid money for this!
Wish the movement was better otherwise potions control could be improved other them that this is a bloody great game
Wish there was more depth, weapons, easier potion access or more smart buttons (dedicated combat/environment/etc), a store.

title.label: Awesome rendition of one of my favorite games!

content.label:
I have always loved this game and was excited to find it available in the app store! Beautifully made and crisp, this game never gets old!

First of all, the wall tunnels keep the exploration factor high and wasn't existent in the original C64 version. Shields are also an improvement over the original as is the addition of wands, vaults, traps and enemy projectiles like skulls and arrows.  And as much as I love the nostalgia the C64 version brings, this version is optimized for iOS and doesn't take anything away but adds so much more.

Regardless of your background with roguelike games, PICK THIS UP IMMEDIATELY!
Still do.
Great dungeon crawler that isn't heavily focused on flashy graphics and animations.  Reminds me of old D & D games of days past.
Brings back great memories. Now I want a Y's Games with this model.
Just like the Fargoal of yore, this rogue can be punishing and exciting. Excellent translation!
I have played a lot of roguelikes and this one is better than I expected.
Retro remake roguelike action. Fun.
Old school. great style of animation. Simple playstyle. Simple enough that anyone can play it for hours, or 15 minutes!

Downloaded. Played for 10 minutes. Deleted. 

The reason for doing this is because NO skill is required. U just move around. Would recommend to young kids for simplicity but other then that, avoid.
D
It's an interesting rouge like. I would have liked to have the option to use a magic character.
Great game. Brings me back to the early day. 4 out of 5. Minus one star because i would have liked to see a tad more animation.
Amazing. Lots of fun
Great soundtrack
Addictive. Simple. Good stuff.

title.label: Very fun an easy to play

content.label:
Great game for a person like me who had to cheat to finally see the end of spelunky. The lowest difficulty is a bit too easy at first but gets better round level 6. I haven't tried the other settings yet. 

Anyway this is a good, fun and accessible roguelike game. Works good for short sessions but it makes me wish my train ride lasted longer!
No customization and no option to make decisions in the game. You could play with your eyes closed and nothing would be different.
Very good casual rogue like game. Would recommend Dungeons of Dredmor as a similar game.

title.label: Fun and accessible Roguelike for beginners

content.label: I have been temped to play a roguelike for about 15 years, since I first saw Nethack. Now I don't have much time for games, but I ride the bus everyday, and this game let's me scratch that 15 year itch!

SoF is one of the simpler Roguelikes yet it managed to remain an entertaining experience every time I pick it up.
Looking forward to the huge update coming our way hopefully before the year is out.
More fun than the c64 version I grew up on. Mostly because of the improved graphics and the simple but brilliant additions like shields. Love!
I really like dungeon crawls.  Fun game. Worth the money spent.  A must play.
A lot of random dying, but a decent rogue like for iPhones.

I have little to complain about this game. It is addicting, different each time you play it, and I enjoy how you learn as you go. The only thing that keeps me from giving it five stars is that I have found some continuety errors. Sometimes when you take damage that would kill you the game automatically takes one of your restoration potions, but sometimes it doesn't. So I have found myself dead even when I have numerous restoration potions...odd.

Been waiting 2 years for this 'awesome sword of fargoal 2 update with new weapons and tiles!' and it has yet to come. Not like they just haven't updated to 2 yet but they haven't even given it even MINOR updates in TWO years. Seriously people, check the date at the bottom..

One of the few retro games I think back to often is the Sword of Fargoal. 
This updated game brings back all the elements of the game I grew up on. The slightly different play modified or best use on the iPhone does not take away from the original game. ie not a true port but due to this SoF has become even better.

title.label: Fan of the classic and fan of the new

content.label: I think they did a great job preserving this classic game. Thank you for making this. Worth every cent to me.

Overall this game is pretty good for a mobile game.  please make this game compatible with iCADE.  This game is perfect for iCADE.

Also where is the universal support (iPad) promised so long ago?
Great app with an excellent feel and gameplay.
If you're looking for a classic Roguelike fix, Fargoal is an excellent choice. It maintains the heart and difficulty of the original game, but with modern controls for ease of play. Great job!

SoF has had a permanent spot on my home screen since early 2010, and I'm still going back to it.
Fun for hard-core dungeon crawl addicts and beginners alike. Highly recommend.

it is a nice game, but a roguelike, probaly not. roguelikes are superhard and unforgiving, i died 7 times in one life, and it always says"fate has intervined" and i respawn at an alter or gold donation thing. would i buy it? yes. but a tad easy. it is a good stepping stone into the rogue like genre, but not for hardcore fans. this would get 5 stars with a difficulty slider =] a good pickup, worth 2 bucks
Bad game, crappy controls, boring. Get POWDER (free ) instead.

Amazing game
Fun an addictive
Hours of gameplay and I still haven't beaten
Worth it's price
Overall : FREAKING AMAZING
Hours of fun - haven't found anything else that comes close.
Best roguelike game on the iPhone.
